reviewText: These are really engaging shows, with just the right mix of science, and info with cartoon characters and "silly stuff" to keep the kids entertained while learning.  My daughter loves them.  I buy them on DVD so she can watch them anytime and doesn't want to be glued to the TV when they're scheduled.
My 4 year old grandson loves this movie!!!
I love the wild kratts all their movies are fantastic and fun education for your children we have many videos at our home and I even buy for gifts cause I love the educational piece and the fun.

My boys are Wild Kratts fanatics... the episodes on this DVD are great (there's a spider one and one about the tree-eating beetle). But there are only 2 episodes on the disc. I am not terribly impressed with the wastefulness of putting only 2 episodes on a disc when they could release them in seasons with several episodes per disc.

This was a present for my youngest daughter. She is a HUGE Kratts fan but I was a bit bummed that there were not more episodes in the DVD.

Oh well, as long as the birthday girl enjoys them....
Movie is fine. We love the Wild Kratts. But it's so short - I always assume there will be at least 4 episodes
My grandkids love this !
Great learnings, these movies are interesting for adults as well.

This DVD contains only 2 episodes from the Wild Kratts cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Secrets of the Spider's Web - Exploring super strength spider silk.
2. Attack of the Tree Eating Aliens - Longhorn beetles are damaging trees.
The best!
My kids love wild kratts!  This dvd is perfect for them.  They love the episodes on this dvd and learning about the different animals.
Good enough
Anything that Wild Kratts produces is the "must have" for this young man (Edwin; 6)!

I would give this FIVE Stars for the how awesome the actual show is. Show is full of great information and very entertaining. My child loves to watch every episode for hours if I let her, and I don't mind her watching because she learns so much great information. BUT this DVD that I purchased to bring in car is a waste of space. There are only TWO shows on this DVD I don't know why they would bother putting out a DVD with two shows! So beware!
